desc: 30% boost to Atk, considerably boosts BB gauge each turn & 75% boost to Spark damage

dictionary.lore: In the distant past, this sword was only granted to history-making champions in the Arena. Just holding this blade heightens the wielder's spiritual focus, and it is said to allow strikes so rapid that opponents cannot retaliate. However, the invincible strength it bestows on wielders also robs them of all eager opponents. Accordingly, it was eventually sealed away beneath the Arena and labeled as a forbidden weapon.

name: Forbidden Blade
